Package org.openhab.core.thing.events

Class ThingEventFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.core.events.AbstractEventFactory
      • org.openhab.core.thing.events.ThingEventFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventFactory
    public class ThingEventFactory
extends AbstractEventFactory
    A ThingEventFactory is responsible for creating thing event instances, e.g. ThingStatusInfoEvents.
    Author:
    Stefan Bu√üweiler - Initial contribution, Dennis Nobel - Added status changed event

      This is a java bean that is used to serialize/deserialize trigger event payload.
